Chapter %s
AWAKENING
You wake up in an abandoned laboratory after an accident. Silence around, interrupted only by the crackling of damaged equipment. Need to restore basic systems and understand what happened.
ENERGY CRISIS
Energy is running out, emergency lighting is flickering. Stabilize the laboratory s energy system before complete shutdown occurs. All survival systems depend on energy.
DATABASES
Access to research data is lost. Restore information systems to uncover the laboratory s secrets. Archives contain keys to understanding what happened.
BIOLABORATORY
Genetic research department holds dangerous secrets. Mutated samples threaten security. Regain control over biological experiments.
NAVIGATION
Maze of destroyed corridors makes movement difficult. Restore navigation systems to find the way to control center and other survivors.
COMMUNICATIONS
Communication with outside world is interrupted. Restore communication equipment to call for help and contact other surviving sections.
TELEPORTATION
Laboratory s quantum physics opens new possibilities. Explore teleportation technologies to quickly move between sectors and find resources.
CRYOSTASIS
Cryogenic department with frozen scientists needs urgent help. Restore life support systems to save employees and obtain valuable information.
ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
Central AI Eva is out of control. Reprogram the artificial intelligence before it makes dangerous decisions.
CENTRAL CONTROL
Final battle for control over the laboratory. Unite all systems to prevent catastrophe and reveal the experiment s main secret.
Check laboratory s basic systems. Restore power supply and life support for further actions.
Reactor hall is out of order. Stabilize temperature regime and reactor s energy flows.
Terminals are locked. Hack security systems to access research data.
Equipment is damaged. Assemble and configure apparatus for launching main systems.
Final check of all systems. Ensure laboratory readiness for full launch.
Energy system is unstable. Balance chemical reagents to stabilize power.
AI neural networks are damaged. Restore artificial intelligence connections for energy management.
Professor s messages are encrypted. Decrypt archive to understand accident causes.
Communication system is disabled. Assemble communication equipment for action coordination.
Final synchronization of power grids. Unite all circuits for stable operation.
Data flows are disrupted. Restore information transfer between servers.
Information channels are overloaded. Redirect data flows for optimal operation.
Archives are encrypted. Breach protection to access research materials.
Server racks are damaged. Reorganize equipment to restore operation.
Final database synchronization. Unite all information flows.
Biological samples are mixed. Sort samples for further research.
DNA chains are damaged. Restore genetic sequences.
Genetic code requires decryption. Solve puzzles to understand mutations.
Molecular structures are disassembled. Assemble complex biological compounds.
Final analysis of genetic data. Synthesize all research materials.
Laboratory maps are damaged. Restore room mapping.
Evacuation routes are blocked. Lay new paths for safe movement.
Navigation systems are disabled. Hack codes to access maps.
Signs are destroyed. Place landmarks for laboratory navigation.
Final navigation calibration. Synchronize all orientation systems.
Frequency filters are off. Configure transceivers for clear signal.
Signals are lost in the air. Create stable data transmission routes.
Messages are encoded. Decode signals to establish connection.
Switching equipment is disassembled. Assemble communication nodes for network.
Final communication setup. Synchronize all communication channels.
Quantum states are unstable. Stabilize particles for teleportation.
Spatial coordinates are desynchronized. Configure destination point.
Teleportation parameters require calculation. Solve equations for calibration.
Particle accelerator is disassembled. Assemble components for launch.
Final teleport synchronization. Activate interspatial portal.
Temperature regimes are violated. Restore cryogenic cooling.
Life support systems are disabled. Launch oxygen and monitoring.
Defrost protocols are locked. Decrypt codes to save scientists.
Cryochambers require reorganization. Optimize capsule placement.
Final cryosystem activation. Prepare chambers for defrosting.
Neural networks are fragmented. Defragment AI memory for recovery.
Logical circuits are damaged. Reprogram artificial intelligence thinking.
Protective algorithms are activated. Hack AI security protocols.
Processor blocks are desynchronized. Calibrate computing modules.
Final AI reboot. Restore full system control.
Laboratory systems are disjointed. Synchronize all control modules.
Energy circuits are separated. Unite flows for maximum power.
Main computer is locked. Perform final system hack.
Reboot protocol is inactive. Activate emergency systems.
FINALE: Launch reboot sequence. Save laboratory from destruction!
